data.meaning_mnemonic: You're in the <radical>rain</radical>, in a <radical>rice paddy</radical>, holding an <radical>umbrella</radical>. You're here because there's nothing else that's very tall around you. You want to get hit by <kanji>electricity</kanji> (aka lightning), to prove that it exists.
data.meaning_hint: Imagine being hit by the electricity. Feel the powerful electric shock pulse through your body. You're like a crazier Ben Franklin out here.
data.reading_mnemonic: After the <kanji>electricity</kanji> hits you, you feel your face. In it is a huge <reading>den</reading>t (でん).
data.reading_hint: Feel the indent in your face. It doesn't hurt, strangely, but it is pretty huge. Panic about this dent a bit.
